title: How do I change my forums (boards beta) avatar or profile picture?
body: How do I change my forums (boards beta) avatar or profile picture?

replies.body:
It's attached to your current summoner icon in the client.  So you'd need to change your summoner icon!

I'm seeing all of them as "?" currently though.  I've already reported it, but I'm not sure if it's just me or if everyone is seeing them like this.

> [{quoted}](name=Hollymonster,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=qE52A4aw,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-28T00:07:22.696+0000)
>
> not sure if it's just me or

Yep. Forever alone. Only you see it like that >=3

jk lol. Same here. Question marks for me since yesterday....or day before. Around there. I figured it was only temporary and be back to normal in a few days. Though I noticed a few people's icons are showing on boards today. but just a few show for me, mine is still blank though

Anyone's icon show for you today?? Just wondering, seeing how a few are showing for me.
When this issue occurs the only icons I can see are Rioters and Wrenchmen - not sure why, but all the others seem to disappear X.x

You know. The odd part is. You Wrench mini icon shows along with your gentleman poro icon when my put my cursor over your name. As for the Original Post, I can see the mini Shadow Poro, but it's blank when I put my cursor over it. As for the Rioters, only their fist icon shows for me.

Hm, good point actually - I see my icon when I mouse over.

This has happened a few times in the past few weeks though - it's happening over on the EUW forums too - generally as mentioned I think it's when the forums/boards teams are tweaking some things - they end up coming back eventually :-)

Oh, snap. Was about done on here, refreshed the page, and my icon was back. Thought they were done working on the boards. Then I still see question mark on the comment below this. lol. So I guess the icons are returning slowly now and nearly done working on boards.
Yeah noticed it on the other forums, not sure why this thread is hatin' on them, but looks like they'll be back soon :-)
I can see them all today.  Must be fixed.  Yay!
I thought so.  Thanks for confirming. :D
It happens on and off whenever the boards team is tinkering with stuff I think :D

Don't really mean to necro a thread, but this issue is still an issue.  I only see question marks, and can't see the icons unless I hover over someones name.  I feel like this is a front-end web dev issue.
Boom! Looks like it cleared up!
